attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has failed to keep its promises, has dimished our rights and freedoms, taxed us beyond reason, and has proven guilty of incompetence, if not outright corruption.  It is no longer representative of the people of the UK, and is therefore un-democratic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
